name: Witch Kitch'
description:
Witch Kitch' Use cooperation in order to help the witch and her apprentice to cook potions and create magic!  Instructions: Shooter:

Use the Arrow Keys UP and DOWN to aim the magic wand up and down, and the keys LEFT and RIGHT to teleport from side to side. Shoot the bottles using SPACE key so the collector can collect them into the potion. 

Collector:

Move from side to side using the Keys A and D and collect the right ingredients for the potion according to the recipe.

Watch as the cat changes colours with every potion you complete successfully.

Beware of the wrong ingredients or your cat will run away!

A Student Project of Bezalel, Academy of Art and Design, and The Hebrew University of Jerusalem.

Graphics by Carmel Lavon, Ruthie Yarmolinsky

Programming by Matan Shomer, Tal Koviazin
